summary: Completed testing of configurable settings feature (reading speed and answer time). All 6 features tested and verified working. Fixed a minor display bug in QuickStats component that was showing hardcoded '180 PPM' instead of the configured value.
passed_tests: SettingsPanel shows 3 reading speed options (Lento 150, Normal 180, Rápido 210)
Answer time slider works correctly with range 15-90 seg
Configuration values displayed in pills in upload zone
Speed pill updates when selecting different speeds (150/180/210)
Answer time pill updates when moving slider
PDF analysis uses custom wpm parameter (verified 150 WPM = 14.8 min for 2221 words)
PDF analysis uses custom answer_time_seconds parameter (verified 45s * 19 questions = 855s)
QuickStats displays correct reading speed after fix
Reading time changes correctly with different WPM values
Question time changes correctly with different answer_time values

settings_panel_speed_options.details: All 3 speed options (Lento 150, Normal 180, Rápido 210) present with correct labels and descriptions

answer_time_slider.details: Slider works correctly with range 15-90 seg, step of 5, displays current value

configuration_pills.details: Pills in upload zone show current settings (e.g., '150 palabras/min (Lento)', '45 seg/respuesta')

pdf_analysis_with_custom_wpm.details: Backend correctly calculates reading time based on wpm parameter. 2221 words at 150 WPM = 888.4s = 14.8 min

pdf_analysis_with_custom_answer_time.details: Backend correctly calculates question time based on answer_time_seconds. 19 questions at 45s = 855s

quickstats_display.details: QuickStats now displays configured reading speed instead of hardcoded 180 PPM

critical_code_review_comments: Fixed: QuickStats.jsx had hardcoded '180 PPM' - now accepts readingSpeed prop
Fixed: HomePage.jsx now passes readingSpeed to QuickStats component
Backend correctly validates wpm (100-300) and answer_time_seconds (10-120) parameters
Frontend correctly passes wpm and answer_time_seconds as query params in API call
context_for_next_testing_agent: Configurable settings feature fully implemented and tested. SettingsPanel allows users to select reading speed (150/180/210 WPM) and answer time (15-90 seconds). These values are passed to the backend API and correctly affect the PDF analysis calculations. QuickStats component was fixed to display the actual configured reading speed instead of a hardcoded value.
